sentences.en: He acts in unquestioning obedience to the orders of his superior.
sentences.cn: 他的行动绝对服从上级的命令.

sentences.en: He demands unquestioning obedience from his followers.
sentences.cn: 他要求追随者对他绝对服从.

sentences.en: Isabella had been taught unquestioning obedience.
sentences.cn: 伊莎贝拉被要求无条件服从。

sentences.en: It is conflict and not unquestioning agreement that deeps freedom alive.
sentences.cn: 正是冲突而不是毫无疑问的赞同使自由保持活力.

sentences.en: It is conflict and not unquestioning agreement that keeps freedom alive.
sentences.cn: 使自由保持活力的是冲突,而不是绝对的一致.

sentences.en: It's conflict , not unquestioning agreement, that keeps freedom alive.
sentences.cn: 完全一致不是自由,充分的争论让自由永存.

sentences.en: Soldiers are expected to follow their leader with unquestioning loyalty.
sentences.cn: 人们期待士兵以毫不犹豫的忠诚跟随其将领.

sentences.en: You can hardly expect unquestioning obedience from last night's partner in a debauch.
sentences.cn: 从昨晚有位搭档的放荡之后,你将不再期待任何坚定不移的听从.

words.tran_cn: 不提出疑问的；不犹豫的；盲目的；无异议的；无条件的

trans.tran_cn: 无异议的，毫无疑问的，不犹豫的
trans.tran_en: an unquestioning faith, attitude etc is very certain and without doubts
